hed: 4 Types of Fall Layering Jackets, 2 Tote Bags, and Everything Else We Want to Buy Right Now
dek: The best brand spanking-new menswear from around the web

items.title: The Hill-Side All Weather High Top Sneakers
items.caption:
Because rain boots make your feet sweat and rubbers are for nerds. These waterproof sneakers will keep you high and dry all fall. 

*$242, available at [contextclothing.com](http://www.contextclothing.com/brands/the-hill-side/sn6-315-all-weather-high-top-sneakers-navy)*

items.title: Gosha Rubchinkskiy Flannel Shirt
items.caption:
Like a slightly off-kilter version of a perfect ‘70s-era flannel. 

*$435, available at [doverstreetmarket.com](http://shop.doverstreetmarket.com/us/dsm-selections/gosha-rubchinskiy/gosha-rubchinskiy-flannel-shirt-green-check)*

items.title: Visvim Travail Coverall Sketches Jacket
items.caption:
The idea of drawing on your own jacket is cool and punk ’n all that good stuff. But maybe it’s something best left to the professionals. 

*$1,945, available at [unionlosangeles.com](http://store.unionlosangeles.com/products/travail-coverall-sketches?variant=5794773509)*

items.title: Isaora Xylite Running Windbreaker
items.caption:
The weather's changing. But if you have this perfect windbreaker, you have no excuse for skipping those chilly morning runs.

*$165, available at [isaora.com](https://www.isaora.com/collections/sportswear/products/xytlite-running-windbreaker?variant=1155817189)*

items.title: Porter Beat Tote Bag
items.caption:
Super minimal but super dope. This tote from Porter Yoshida in Japan is an ultra luxe example of less is more.

*$239, available at [clubmonaco.com](http://www.clubmonaco.com/product/index.jsp?productId=66436846)*

Don’t think of it as a scarf—think of it like a cold weather investment. 

*$475, available at [burberry.com](https://us.burberry.com/the-classic-cashmere-scarf-in-check-p39942071)*

items.title: Alpha Fit Men’s Cleansing
items.caption:
Because using your dirty hands to clean your dirty face doesn’t make a lot of sense. 

*$189, available [clarisonic.com](http://www.clarisonic.com/CL29-CL29.html)*

items.title: Converse Cons One Star Pro
items.caption:
This simple, classic, affordable sneaker is already great, but it’s cool-kid factor just went through the roof thanks to an update from skater (and Supreme model) [Sage Elsesser](https://instagram.com/sageelsesser/?hl=en). 

*$75, available at [converse.com](http://www.converse.com/regular/cons-one-star-pro/149869C_065.html?CSINT=CONS_gridwall_OneStarPro)*

items.title: Nice Laundry Athletic Socks (set of six)
items.caption:
It’s hard to remember to buy new socks, especially super basic but super important ones. These come six in a pack and if you are so inclined you can even get a quarterly subscription. Your feet will never ruin a first date again.

*$49, available at [nicelaundry.com](http://www.nicelaundry.com/products/darkhorse)*

items.title: Kitsune Faux Shearling Trucker Jacket
items.caption:
No sheep were shaved in the making of this vintage-inspired fall jacket. 

*$495, available at [Mr Porter.com](http://www.mrporter.com/en-us/mens/maison_kitsune/faux-shearling-trimmed-corduroy-jacket/588900)*

items.title: Acne Studios Jam Black Jacket
items.caption:
Because it’s the most [layerable jacket](http://www.gq.com/story/how-to-layer-denim-jacket) of the season. 

*$299, available at [endclothing.com](http://www.endclothing.com/us/latest-products/new-this-week/acne-studios-jam-black-jacket-22t153-900.html)*

items.title: KIKA NY Leather Duffle Backpack in Dark Tan
items.caption:
It’s not quite a backpack (back-bag?), but this minimalist oversized masterpiece could actually replace your duffle bag on a weekend away.

*$1,325, available at [unionmadegoods.com] (http://unionmadegoods.com/product/kika-ny-leather-duffle-backpack-in-dark-tan/)*
